name: vscode-isml-linter
description: Integrates ISML Linter into VS Code.
author: Fabiow Quixad√°

scripts.upgrade:linter: cd ../isml-linter/ && npm pack && cd ../vscode-isml-linter/ && npm i ../isml-linter//isml-linter-5.36.4.tgz && yarn pack:ext && yarn install:ext
scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd ..
scripts.up:linter: git stash -u && npm i isml-linter@latest && git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade ISML Linter"
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
